ingredients.content: 900 g lamb meat for stew, boneless, cut in pieces (3 cm)

preparations.content: Place garlic and oil in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 7<b>, then sauté <b>7 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add lamb, salt and pepper then cook <b>10 min/120°C//speed <b>.
Add paprika, vinegar, oregano, thyme and bay leaf then cook <b>7 min/120°C//speed <b>.
Add wine and cook <b>10 min/100°C//speed <b>. Pour into bowls and serve hot.
